snippet.title: Ninja Scroller by Mars Touch Studio - 1.61.4 - RELEASE with 2 NEW SKILLS
snippet.description:
Ninja Scroller by Mars Touch Studio
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2150800/Ninja_Scroller/
https://gamejolt.com/games/NinjaScroller/667996
https://mars-touch-studio.itch.io/ninja-scroller

==============================

Ninja Scroller 1.61.4 RELEASE
Ninja Scroller DEMO 1.61.4 RELEASE
With 2 NEW SKILLS: DOUBLE JUMP & QUICK FALL ATTACK!

https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2150800/view/6485829649599939874

NINJUTSU (NIN = obstinacy, stamina, stealth)
Obstinacy & Stamina, two essential qualities to finish my game and the DEMO.
Start by completing the DEMO!
If at the end you feel an irrepressible desire to see more.
Buy the game and prepare to suffer to become a Legendary Ninja.
Otherwise "Fly, you fools!"

If you like the game consider writing review.
Because those who don't like it won't forget to do it.

Watch 120s of Gameplay Trailer

For more information on the game visit the links below.

==============================

Ninja Scroller is a challenging pixel art action runner game with a retrogaming vibe.
You will face ninjas, wolves and tornadoes.

Features:
- If you lose it's always your fault
- Use intelligence, reflexes and stamina
- 7 levels of intense and epic difficulty
- More than 55 achievements
- At least 4 hours to complete the game at 100%

Current releases:
- 1.61.4 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam, Gamejolt and Itchio
- DEMO 1.61.4 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam, Gamejolt and Itchio

Available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2150800/Ninja_Scroller/

Available on GameJolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/NinjaScroller/667996

Available on Itchio:
https://mars-touch-studio.itch.io/ninja-scroller

Official Ninja Scroller page:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/ninja-scroller/

Official Ninja Scroller press kit page:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/ninja-scroller-press-kit/

Follow Mars Touch Studio on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/MarsTouchStudio

Official Mars Touch Studio Website:
https://www.mars-touch-studio.com/
